alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Hopkins; Lyon; McLean; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 07 at 4:57AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of western Kentucky, including the following areas, Caldwell, Calloway, Carlisle, Christian, Fulton, Graves, Hickman, Hopkins, Lyon, Marshall, McLean, Muhlenberg, Todd and Trigg. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Another round of one to one and half inches of rain are expected to move back across this area this morning. Any additional rain will cause quick rises in creeks and streams over already saturated ground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Christian; Hopkins; Lyon; McLean; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg
